sentences.sentence: I will send you my Magical Photo, which I will magnetize especially for you.
sentences.translation: 我将向您发送我神奇的照片，我会对你特别磁化。

sentences.sentence: E-business Endorsements can magnetize guests to your website and cheer them to buy.
sentences.translation: 电子商务宣传喜迎顾客进入你的网站并鼓励他们去购买产品。

sentences.sentence: A magnet and magnetic mud are inserted into contact face of conventional artware to magnetize the contact faces.
sentences.translation: 它的特征是在传统装饰工艺品的接触面嵌进磁铁和磁泥，使接触面具有磁吸引力。
